Text.EN: Certified Decree of the Hanseatic League Master builder

AdditionalInformation.EN: Reduces the costs of building Historic warehouses in a Settlement. A new era of Trade is dawning!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Verringert die Kosten beim Bau einer Speicherstadt in einer Siedlung. Eine neu Ära des Handels steht bevor!

Text.EN: Princely decree of the Oriental master builder

AdditionalInformation.EN: Reduces the costs of building a Sultan's mosque in a Settlement. Gold cupolas under a dazzling sky!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Verringert die Kosten beim Bau einer Sultansmoschee in einer Siedlung. Goldene Kuppeln unter strahlendem Himmel!

Text.EN: Imperial decree of the Imperial cathedral Master builder

AdditionalInformation.EN: Reduces the costs of building an Imperial cathedral in a Settlement. The Builder's huts have received orders...

Description.EN: For the good of the People

Text.EN: Warranted decree of the Fleet Master builder

AdditionalInformation.EN: Reduces the Costs of building Ships in a Settlement. May you always have six inches of water under your keel...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Verringert die Kosten beim Bau von Schiffen in einer Siedlung. Immer eine Hand breit Wasser unter dem Kiel...
